name: Sister Hospitaller
description: A battlefield healer of both mind and soul. You ministrate to the injured with great Medicae expertise and inspire the pious with your cavernous well of faith.

abilities.name: Loyal Compassion
abilities.description: +Double Rank bonus dice whenever you make a Medicae (Int) Test on a character with the IMPERIUM Keyword.

name: Ministorum Priest
description: You preach and enforce the Imperial Cult. You lead the faithful to execute His will, inflaming faithful hearts with your impassioned oration.

abilities.name: Fiery Invective
abilities.description: You can preach the word of the Imperial Creed as a Free Action once per combat. You and all allies with the IMPERIUM Keyword heal 1d3+Rank Shock.

name: Imperial Guardsman
description: A footsoldier in the galaxy's greatest army. You are one of billions of raw recruits trained to stand and fire against the monstrous enemies of humanity.

abilities.name: Look Out, Sir!
abilities.description: You have been drilled in sacrificing yourself to save your allies. Once per combat, you may take a Reflexive Action to move up to half your Speed to get in the way of any attack that hit an ally. The attacker then rolls against your Resilience instead of your ally's, and may deal Wounds to you. Your Resilience increases by +Rank for the purpose of calculating this damage.

name: Inquisitorial Acolyte
description: Conscripted to aid an Inquisitor, you identify and destroy threats to the Imperium.

abilities.name: Inquisitorial Decree
abilities.description: You can invoke the name of your Inquisitor to gain +Rank bonus dice to any social Skill test when interacting with an individual with the IMPERIUM Keyword. You can only use this ability once per scene.

wargearChoices: Any two IMPERIUM weapons with a Value of 5 or less and a Rarity of Uncommon or lower

name: Inquisitorial Sage
description: You are a bureaucratic savant, an expert at sourcing and judiciously applying knowledge to serve the Imperium and your own ends.

abilities.name: Administratum Records
abilities.description: You are particularly adept at navigating the Imperium's colossal bureaucracy. You gain +Rank bonus dice whenever you make a Test to gather information from Imperial sources, typically on Influence or Investigation (Int) tests.

name: Ganger
description: A member of the Imperial underclass, your life is rife with violence and hardship. Your identity is tied to a territorial gang, a brutal reflection of lower hive life.

abilities.name: Scrounger
abilities.description: Your life with less has made you adept at finding spares and supplies in the most unlikely of places. You gain +Rank bonus dice to Cunning (Fel) Tests. Once per session you may make an Influence or Cunning Test to acquire an item, representing something you have prepared in advance.

wargearChoices: A Knife or a Sword, and a Laspistol or Autopistol or Hand Cannon or Stubber

name: Corsair
description: A space pirate, a self-imposed exile of your Species, you raid and fight for coin, and to experience the full spectrum of sensation and emotion.

abilities.name: Dancing on the Blade's Edge
abilities.description: You throw yourself into danger with reckless abandon to hide your ancestral fears. You gain +Rank bonus dice whenever you make or resist an Athletics (S) or Persuasion (Fel) Interaction Attack. You suffer a +1 DN penalty to Fear Tests.

name: Ork Boy
description: A hulking, brutish creature who lives only to fight. You are a loutish, anarchic bruiser born for battle.

abilities.name: Get Stuck In
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice to melee attacks for every ally engaged with the same target as you.

name: Sister of Battle
description: An unwavering warrior of righteous determination, you are a warrior monk, raising battle hymns as you zealously destroy the Emperor's foes.

abilities.name: Purity of Faith
abilities.description: You and any allies within 15 metres gain +Double Rank bonus dice to Corruption Tests. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice to any Test to resist the effects of a Psychic Power.

wargearChoices: A Boltgun or a Bolt Pistol and a Chainsword

name: Sanctioned Psyker
description: A mutant capable of channelling the Warp to manipulate reality.

abilities.name: Psyker
abilities.description: You have the PSYKER Keyword, and are a Psyker. You know the Universal Psyker Abilities, 1 Minor Psychic Power and the Smite psychic power. You may purchase additional psychic powers, following the rules in Chapter 11.

name: Skitarius
description: A soldier more of steel than sinew, you are a member of the standing army of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

abilities.name: Blessed Redundancy
abilities.description: You have been rebuilt with redundant organs and systems. You do not suffer any effects from the Bleeding Condition, and gain +Rank additional Wounds.

name: Tempestus Scion
description: An elite stormtrooper of the Astra Militarum, you have been trained from childhood for high-risk operations.

abilities.name: Special Operations
abilities.description: When you spend a Glory to Seize the Initiative or for a narrative benefit related to your training, you can spend 1 Glory to give an ally with the IMPERIUM Keyword a half-action instead of having to spend 2 Glory.

name: Rogue Trader
description: A licensed privateer of the Imperium, you ply the stars in search of profit, glory, and adventure.

abilities.name: Warrant of Trade
abilities.description: You wield the authority of an ancient Warrant of Trade. You gain +Double Rank to Influence and Persuasion Tests when dealing with Imperial citizens. Once per session, you may use your Warrant to avoid punishment for a crime within the Imperium.

name: Scavvy
description: A wretched outcast living on the fringes of Imperial society, you survive through cunning and desperation.

abilities.name: Wretched Resilience
abilities.description: You have adapted to survive in the harshest conditions. You gain +Rank bonus dice to Tests to resist disease, poison, or environmental hazards. You may consume rotten or contaminated food without ill effect.

name: Space Marine Scout
description: A neophyte Space Marine still undergoing transformation, you infiltrate enemy lines and eliminate threats with precision.

abilities.name: Use the Terrain
abilities.description: You gain +Rank to any Stealth (A) Test when there is some form of terrain to hide behind.

wargearChoices: A Boltgun or a Bolt Pistol and Chainsword or an Astartes Shotgun or an Astartes Sniper Rifle and Cameleoline Cloak

name: Ranger
description: Embracing the path of the Outcast, you stealthily travel the galaxy in search of new experiences, eliminating threats to your Craftworld from afar.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: You are adept at exploiting any form of concealment. Whenever a Vision Penalty or Cover impose a penalty on someone trying to attack or detect you, the penalty is increased by +Rank DN.

name: Kommando
description: An extraordinary example of your Species, you employ cunning, stealth, and self-discipline to accomplish acts of underhanded brutality.

abilities.name: Kunnin' Plan
abilities.description: You and any of your allies with the ORK Keyword within 15 metres gain +Rank bonus dice to Stealth (A) Tests.

name: Tech-Priest
description: A high-ranking member of the Adeptus Mechanicus, technology and religion are as one to you, and you are truly devout.

abilities.name: Rite of Repair
abilities.description: You receive +Double Rank to Tech (Int) Tests to repair damaged machinery. All Tech (Int) Tests you make take half the standard time.

name: Crusader
description: A warrior-monk of the Ecclesiarchy, worship to the Emperor and single combat against His foes are as one to you.

abilities.name: Armour of Faith
abilities.description: Your faith is a shield against harm. You gain +Rank Resilience. Additionally, you may spend a Wrath Point to ignore the effects of a single hit for one round.

name: Imperial Commissar
description: A political officer of the Astra Militarum, you maintain morale and discipline through inspiration and fear.

abilities.name: Summary Execution
abilities.description: You can execute a subordinate with the IMPERIUM Keyword as a Full Action. All allies who witness this execution within 15 metres regain Shock equal to Double your Rank and gain +Rank bonus dice on their next Test. If you execute an enemy, allies gain these benefits but also +1 Glory to the party.

name: Desperado
description: A dangerous outlaw skilled in deception and violence, you operate outside the law for profit or survival.

abilities.name: Dirty Tricks
abilities.description: You gain +Double Rank bonus dice to Cunning Tests to set up ambushes or traps. Once per session, you may automatically succeed on a Stealth or Deception Test against a single target.

name: Tactical Space Marine
description: A fully-fledged battle-brother of the Adeptus Astartes, you are a versatile warrior capable of adapting to any battlefield situation.

abilities.name: Tactical Versatility
abilities.description: Your training has prepared you for any circumstance. When you make a Critical Hit you may roll twice on the Critical Hit Table and choose either result.

name: Warlock
description: Harnessing eldritch power and aspect warrior training, you are an aggressive battle Psyker driven to war.

abilities.name: Runes of Battle
abilities.description: You have the PSYKER Keyword, and are a Psyker. You know the Universal Psyker Abilities, the Smite psychic power, a single Runes of Battle power of your choice, and may learn other powers as described in Chapter 11.

name: Ork Nob
description: Larger and stronger than most Orks, your uncanny size and brawn earn a natural place violently ruling over other Boyz.

abilities.name: The Green Tide
abilities.description: You command a mob of Boyz equal to your Rank x3. If any of your Boyz die, they can be replaced between sessions at the GM's discretion.

name: Inquisitor
description: Most powerful of the Emperor's agents, you have been bestowed unlimited authority to aid in your relentless hunt of Humanity's greatest enemies.

abilities.name: Unchecked Authority
abilities.description: You have supreme authority to maintain the security of the Imperium. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice whenever you make a social Skill Test against a character with the IMPERIUM Keyword.

wargearChoices: Any two weapons with a Value of 7 or less and a Rarity of Very Rare or lower, and Flak Coat or Carapace Armour or Ignatus Power Armour or Light Power Armour

name: Primaris Intercessor
description: You are a new breed of Astartes, a focused super soldier possessing power beyond even the Space Marines.

abilities.name: Intercessor Focus
abilities.description: You gain +Double Rank bonus dice to any Ballistic Skill (A) Tests to fire a ranged weapon with the PRIMARIS Keyword.

name: Death Cult Assassin
description: An extremist zealot who worships through ritual slaughter. You depend upon your swift movement and honed reflexes to avoid harm.

abilities.name: Glancing Blow
abilities.description: You may use your Agility instead of your Toughness when you roll Determination against Damage from attacks, and may roll Determination against Mortal Wounds. You cannot use this ability if you are immobilised in some way, such as through the Restrained Condition.

name: Sister Repentia
description: A fallen Sister of Battle seeking redemption through martyrdom. You crave redemption or martyrdom, fighting harder when closest to death.

abilities.name: Solace in Anguish
abilities.description: You ignore DN penalties for being Wounded, and instead gain +Rank Bonus Dice to all melee Attack Tests whilst Wounded. When you are Dying, this bonus applies for all Tests â€” you do not fall Prone, and are not restricted in which actions you can take. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice to any Test to resist the effects of a Psychic Power.

name: Sister Dialogus
description: A master of written and spoken language, recording your companions' speeches and interesting discoveries for later recital.

abilities.name: Polyglot Superior
abilities.description: When you speak aloud another person's words (for example, translating xenos text, distributing an officer's orders, repeating another agent's inspiring oration, reciting scripture), gain +Rank Bonus Dice to any corresponding Test. Half any DN penalties for interacting with an unfamiliar species or culture.

name: Sister Imagifier
description: A bearer of sacred relics who inspires the faithful with the deeds of martyrs and saints.

abilities.name: Litany of Deeds
abilities.description: When you carry or are adjacent to your Simulacrum Imperialis, you and any allies faithful to the Imperial Cult within hearing distance gain +1 Strength. In addition, as a Combat Action, you can plant your Simulacrum in place. Until you next move, you and any allies faithful to the Imperial Cult within 5m gain +Rank Determination.

name: Seraphim
description: A jump pack-equipped assault specialist who descends upon enemies like an avenging angel.

abilities.name: Angelic Presence
abilities.description: You and any allies within 15m faithful to the Imperial Cult gain +Rank Bonus Dice to Resolve Tests. In addition, when you use a jump pack to move away from Engagement, enemies cannot make Reflexive Attacks against you.

wargearChoices: 2 Bolt Pistols or 2 Hand Flamers or 2 Inferno Pistols

name: Canoness
description: A commander of the Adepta Sororitas, you are an inspiring warleader and walking miracle.

abilities.name: Lead the Righteous
abilities.description: You gain +Rank Faith. Whenever you deal a Wound, you may spend 1 Faith to gain +1 Glory as a Free Action.

wargearChoices: A Condemnor Boltgun, or a Boltgun with the Combi Weapon upgrade combined with a Flamer, Meltagun or Plasma Gun. A Blessed Blade or a Chainsword or an Eviscerator or a Power Sword. A Bolt Pistol or a Plasma Pistol or an Inferno Pistol. A Brazier of Holy Fire or a Null Rod.

name: Tech-Adept
description: A technical operator in service of the Priesthood of Mars, skilled at navigating and maintaining technology.

abilities.name: Admin Access
abilities.description: Your purpose is to commune with Machine Spirits and catalogue their wisdom, to further the Quest for Knowledge. When you commune with a Machine Spirit as part of a Test, you gain Icons equal to your Rank.

name: Sicarian Infiltrator
description: A cyber-augmented assassin who disrupts enemies with neurostatic fields.

abilities.name: Neurostatic Aura
abilities.description: You are immune to Bleeding. As a Combat Action, you may choose a number up to your Rank, and inflict that many Hindered Conditions on all characters within 10m that don't have this ability or null-code audio inputs.

wargearChoices: Flechette Blaster and Taser Goad or Stubcarbine and Power Sword

name: Sicarian Ruststalker
description: A hunter-killer operative delivering a hail of transonic blows until finding the perfect armour-shredding frequency.

abilities.name: Transonic Assassin
abilities.description: You are immune to Bleeding. In addition, you gain +Rank bonus dice when Charging or making All-Out Attacks whilst wielding a weapon with the TRANSONIC Keyword.

wargearChoices: 2 Transonic Blades or a Transonic Razor and a Chordclaw

name: Tech-Priest Dominus
description: A high-ranking Tech-Priest who automatically interfaces with nearby technology.

abilities.name: Lord of the Machine Cult
abilities.description: You are unbound by the tethers of your biological form, automatically interfacing with nearby technology. As a Simple Action, you can Help all allies within 10m that have the ADEPTUS MECHANICUS Keyword, or are utilising equipment with a Machine Spirit (including guns and non-basic melee weapons), granting +Rank Bonus Dice to their Tests.

wargearChoices: Volkite Blaster or Eradication Ray. Macrostubber or Phosphor Serpenta. Any 3 Augmetics.

name: Confessor
description: A spiritual guide who extracts confessions and administers penance to the faithful.

abilities.name: Spiritual Administration
abilities.description: When you Test to discover the sins of another character (by coercion, investigation, or instinct), gain +Rank Bonus Dice. In addition, during a Regroup, you can choose one character faithful to the Imperial Cult to regain all Shock.

name: Ratling Sniper
description: A diminutive abhuman sharpshooter known for exceptional marksmanship and stealth.

abilities.name: Shoot Sharp and Scarper
abilities.description: When using a weapon with the Sniper Weapon Trait, increase the weapon's Sniper rating by +Rank. In addition, when you make a successful ranged Attack Test, you may immediately move up to your Speed as a Reflexive Action.

wargearChoices: Ratling Rifle or Long Las

name: Ogryn Warrior
description: A massive abhuman shock trooper whose approach to combat is simple, direct, and expends plenty of ammunition.

abilities.name: Let It Rip
abilities.description: When you Charge and have a ranged weapon, you can fire it wildly as a Free Action. This is treated as a Salvo Option that awards Bonus Dice to your Melee Attack Test equal to your weapon's Salvo rating.

name: Bullgryn
description: A walking wall of heavy armour and close-assault weaponry, first into battle with an army of comrades sheltering behind you.

abilities.name: Shieldwall
abilities.description: You provide your allies with a mobile defence line formed of carapace, tank tracks and Abhuman muscle. If an attack is made against an ally within 3m, that ally can add your Shield's Armour Rating to their Armour Rating.

wargearChoices: A Slabshield and Grenadier Gauntlet or a Bullgryn Maul and Brute Shield

name: Lexmechanic
description: A walking source of information and calculation, devising mathematical solutions for any problems you encounter.

abilities.name: Statistical Certainty
abilities.description: The assistance you provide your allies comes with the benefit of exacting mathematical analysis, to remove all possibility of ill-fortune or doubt. When you Help an ally, you may reduce the amount of Bonus Dice you provide by an amount equal up to your Rank. For every die removed, your ally gains an extra Icon on their Test result.

name: Interrogator
description: An apprentice Inquisitor, beginning your training by learning to coerce information from unwilling subjects.

abilities.name: Extract the Truth
abilities.description: To earn an Inquisitorial Rosette, the first skill you must master is to lay bare the sinful hearts of Human and xenos. When you succeed on a Test to acquire information from an individual, you gain free Shifts equal to your Rank.

wargearChoices: Any three pieces of Wargear with the IMPERIUM Keyword of a rarity of Rare or less

name: Kroot Mercenary
description: A carnivorous xenos warrior who scours the galaxy seeking strong prey to consume, working as a mercenary to fund your travels.

abilities.name: Adaptive Loyalty
abilities.description: You gain the [ANY] Keyword, which should be substituted for the Faction that currently commands your allegiance. At the GM's discretion, you may swap this Keyword out for a different one when your loyalties shift in play.

name: Astartes Apothecary
description: An expert combat medic specialising in treating the superhuman physiology of your battle-brothers.

abilities.name: Prime Helix
abilities.description: Your duty to your injured battle brothers is second only to your duty to the fallen. When you succeed on a Medicae Test to heal a target's Wounds, they recover +Rank additional Wounds.

name: Astartes Chaplain
description: The mouthpiece of your Chapter's spiritual beliefs, tending to the psychological well-being of your comrades.

abilities.name: Chapter Cult
abilities.description: You gain 1 Faith, and can purchase Faith Talents available to characters with the ADEPTUS MINISTORUM Keyword. As a Combat Action, you may spend 1 Faith to give an ally within hearing distance your [CHAPTER] Keyword for the rest of the scene. Any allies within 5xRank metres who share your [CHAPTER] Keyword gain +Rank to Resolve Tests.

name: Astartes Librarian
description: A battle-psyker of the Adeptus Astartes, a terrifying combination of inhuman might and Warp-endowed power.

abilities.name: Librarius Discipline
abilities.description: You have the PSYKER Keyword, and are a psyker. You know the Universal Psyker Abilities and the Smite psychic power. You know the Librarius Discipline and one power from that Discipline of your choice, and may choose one other Psychic Discipline to learn powers from.

name: Primaris Reiver
description: An infiltrator, saboteur and guerilla fighter, unleashing your full Primaris strength in carefully coordinated terror attacks.

abilities.name: Terror Tactics
abilities.description: When your Stealth Score is reduced to 0 or you Ambush a Threat, you can choose for all enemies who can see or hear you to take a Terror Test, with a DN equal to 1 + Rank.

name: 1st Company Veteran
description: Honoured and revered by your fellow battle-brothers, you have earned the right to be counted among the ranks of the prestigious 1st Company.

abilities.name: Veteran of the Endless War
abilities.description: Your experience across hundreds of worlds, spanning centuries of bloodshed, have made you an unrelenting weapon of the Emperor. When you make a Critical Hit, you may swap the dice values in the d66 roll (a 34, becomes a 43). You may ignore the first critical hit you suffer in each game session.

wargearChoices: Power Fist or Power Sword or Plasma Pistol or Storm Bolter

name: Eliminator
description: You are a dedicated marksman, patient and ruthless, eliminating high-value targets or delivering pinpoint, accurate fire support.

abilities.name: Emperor's Judgement
abilities.description: When using a ranged weapon and aiming, a 6 on the Wrath die on a successful attack either inflicts a further 1d3 Mortal Wounds, or allows you to make a free Movement action once the attack is finished.

name: Incursor
description: A shock assault specialist, you sow fear, confusion and death among the ranks of the enemy with precision Bolter fire and brutal melee attacks.

abilities.name: Explosive Fury
abilities.description: When making attacks with grenades, you gain +Rank bonus extra damage to successful attacks. When placing explosives, you may make a DN 3 Tech Test, and add +Rank bonus to both Damage and AP to the attack.

name: Terminator
description: Encased in the Chapter's most ancient and revered armour, you are a walking bulwark against which the enemies of the Imperium shatter and break.

abilities.name: Inspiring Bulwark
abilities.description: Encased in the Chapter's most honoured and revered armour, your resilience on the battlefield acts as a source of inspiration to your battle-brothers. Once per combat round you may spend a point of Glory to ignore all damage from one successful attack made against you. Allies who witness this feat add +Double Rank bonus dice to their Resolve Test for the remainder of that round.

wargearChoices: Chainfist or Power Sword; Assault Cannon or Heavy Flamer; Thunder Hammer and Storm Shield or two Lightning Claws

name: Techmarine
description: Wielding terrifying mechadendrites and servo-arms, you embody the Omnissiah's gifts to the Chapter.

abilities.name: Blessings of the Omnissiah
abilities.description: You are a warrior of the Omnissiah. When you succeed on a Tech (Int) Test to repair a weapon or vehicle, you gain +Rank bonus dice to the test. When you commune with a machine spirit as part of a test, you instead gain Icons equal to your rank.

name: Primaris Lieutenant
description: An honourable and veteran warrior, you lead your battle-brothers to war in the Chapter and the Emperor's name.

abilities.name: Tactical Master
abilities.description: In each combat round, if you spend a point of Glory, all allies within 10 metres gain your Rank bonus as Extra Damage dice, and ranged weapons these allies carry without the HEAVY Trait gain the ASSAULT Trait.

name: Bladeguard Veteran
description: As a Veteran Space Marine, you have already distinguished yourself among your brethren and now wield ancient relics in your defence of Gilead.

abilities.name: Sword Master
abilities.description: In each combat round, as a Free Action, you may spend a point of Glory to either add +Rank bonus dice to your melee attack Test or add +Rank bonus dice to your Resilience.

name: Company Ancient
description: A veteran of the 1st Company, you were personally chosen to carry forth an ancient banner of the Chapter, inspiring those around you.

abilities.name: Glory of the Emperor
abilities.description: Allies within 50 metres that can see you restore Shock equal to the number of successes you achieved on a DN 4 Leadership Test.

name: Guardian
description: You have been called from civilian pursuits to don your war mask and defend your people.

abilities.name: Martial Citizenry
abilities.description: You are drilled in using basic Asuryani weaponry. When attacking whilst in cover, gain +Rank to the Rending rating of any SHURIKEN weapons. When attacking an enemy in cover, gain +Rank ED on any melee attacks.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Catapult or Shuriken Pistol and Guardian Chainsword

name: Dark Reaper
description: You are a foreboding wielder of heavy weaponry, reaping formations of soldiers in a barrage of explosive missiles.

abilities.name: Inescapable Accuracy
abilities.description: Your targeting systems and uncanny precision make it impossible for your victims to hide. When making a ranged attack, you may reduce the total DN penalties you suffer due to Long Range, Vision Penalties, and the target's Cover by an amount equal to your Rank. When you Brace a Heavy Weapon, you may Aim as a Free Action.

name: Dire Avenger
description: You are a student of the first Aspect Warrior Temple, exemplifying retribution, valour, and relentless firing discipline.

abilities.name: Defence Tactics
abilities.description: You advance, take cover, and complete your objectives without ever interrupting rate of fire. You may make a ranged attack with a SHURIKEN weapon as a Free Action, but cannot do so in the same Turn you use Combat Actions to make another ranged, melee, or Interaction Attack. You can use this ability up to Rank times per combat, and never more than once per Turn.

name: Fire Dragon
description: You are a tank-hunter and fortification-leveller, applying the focused fury of concentrated fire.

abilities.name: Assured Destruction
abilities.description: With intense heat, you boil your targets from the inside out. You may activate the Melta Trait of any weapons you wield at Medium and Long Range (not just Short Range), and gain +Double Rank ED when making attacks with those weapons.

name: Howling Banshee
description: You are a quicksilver melee combatant, leaping into every assault with an ear-splitting howl.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: You are a shock assault specialist, delivering such a devastating first strike that your enemies are left reeling. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice on melee attacks and Interaction Attacks made as part of a Charge.

name: Striking Scorpion
description: You employ stealth to infiltrate enemy positions before attacking in a roar of spinning blades.

abilities.name: Stalking Shadow
abilities.description: You temper your lust to kill by silently hunting your prey first. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice and +Double Rank ED when making a Surprise Attack (in addition to the usual +2 bonus dice and +2 ED).

name: Swooping Hawk
description: You effortlessly soar across the battlefield on wings formed of vibrating feather plates and gravitic lifters.

abilities.name: Skyleap
abilities.description: You employ hit-and-run manoeuvres to frustrate your enemies. You do not provoke Reflexive Attacks when you move out of Engagement. You also gain +Double Rank bonus dice on Pinning Attacks.

name: Warp Spider
description: You risk short leaps through the Warp to outmanoeuvre your enemies before shredding them with razor-sharp monofilament wire.

abilities.name: Flickerjump
abilities.description: You appear just long enough to weave a deadly web before disappearing from sight. When an enemy enters Engagement with you whilst you are Unengaged, you may move up to your Speed as a Reflexive Action. You can use this ability up to Rank times per combat.

name: Wraithguard
description: Your undying soul is transplanted into an imposing wraithbone shell so you can continue to fight from beyond death.

abilities.name: War Construct
abilities.description: Your new body weathers the strains of battle better than any living creature could. Any ranged weapons you wield without the Heavy Trait gain the Pistol Trait. When wielding two melee weapons, you reduce the DN penalty for making Multi-Attacks by 2. You gain +Rank Determination.

wargearChoices: Wraithcannon or two Ghostswords

name: Autarch
description: Your experience training at multiple Aspect Warrior Temples has prepared you to become the ultimate battlefield general.

abilities.name: Superlative Strategist
abilities.description: When you, or any allies within communication range, spend Glory to increase their dice pool, they gain +Rank bonus dice (in addition to bonus dice equal to the Glory spent). You may make Leadership Tests to remove the Fear, Terror, or Pinned Conditions as a Simple Action.

wargearChoices: Death Spinner or Dragon Fusion Gun or Reaper Launcher or Shuriken Pistol; Banshee Blade or Scorpion Chainsword or Star Glaive; Fusion Charges or Howling Banshee Mask or Mandiblasters or Swooping Hawk Wings or Warp Spider Jump Generator or Plasma Grenades

name: Farseer
description: You channel psychic powers that reveal the myriad paths of the future, using your foreknowledge to shape the destiny of entire species.

abilities.name: The Witch Path
abilities.description: You are a supremely powerful Psyker, specialising in manipulation of the future. You know the Universal Psyker Abilities and the Smite psychic power. You may choose two powers you know from any of the following Disciplines: Divination, Runes of Fate, Runes of Fortune.

wargearChoices: Witchblade or Singing Spear

name: Kabalite Warrior
description: You are the beating heart of your Kabal's fighting strength, a murderous, power-hungry killer with dark ambitions.

abilities.name: Prey on the Weak
abilities.description: Your mind is focused by the scent of fear and suffering. You gain +Rank bonus dice on attack Tests against enemies that have suffered Wounds, or Mobs of Troops that have suffered casualties.

name: Wych
description: You are a lightning-fast slayer and gladiatorial performer, renowned in the Dark City for your murderous arts.

abilities.name: Lightning Dodge
abilities.description: You run circles around your enemy and take them apart one slice at a time. When wearing no armour besides a Wychsuit, you gain +Rank Defence against melee attacks.

name: Hellion
description: You are an adrenaline junkie and anarchist street racer, tearing across the galaxy atop a personal skyboard.

abilities.name: Hit and Run
abilities.description: You revel in the confusion of swift attacks, striking fast before sweeping away from victims who fall prey to your skyboard or hellglaive. You do not provoke Reflexive Attacks when you move out of Engagement. You gain +Rank bonus dice on any Pilot (A) Tests related to the operation of your Skyboard.

name: Beastmaster
description: You capture and command the deadliest animals in the galaxy, showcasing their lethal characteristics in the amphitheatres of Commorragh.

abilities.name: Beast Handler
abilities.description: You command respect from wild animals, cowing them into obedience. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice on all social Skill Tests against a creature with the BEAST Keyword. When you consent, allied BEAST creatures in communication range can spend your Wrath Points as their own.

name: Incubus
description: You are the formidable disciple of an elite warrior creed, and mercenary bodyguard to the paranoid rulers of the Dark City.

abilities.name: Lethal Precision
abilities.description: You train tirelessly to master the perfect killing strike. When you inflict a Critical Hit on a melee attack, you inflict +Double Rank Mortal Wounds.

name: Mandrake
description: You exist simultaneously in reality and a cursed otherworld, not entirely corporeal, driven by your own malevolent instincts.

abilities.name: Shadow Creature
abilities.description: You are not a creature of flesh and blood, instead dwelling in a liminal state between realities. When you are not wearing armour, you gain +Rank Resilience, and can roll Determination against attacks that inflict Mortal Wounds. You always count as being in heavy fog, with all corresponding vision penalties. When you move, you ignore all obstacles between your start and end point, so long as you move from one shadow to another.

name: Scourge
description: You have undergone surgery adapting your body for flight, and deliver messages across the Dark City for the rich and powerful.

abilities.name: Winged Strike
abilities.description: You are grafted with wings that allow you to fly at double your normal Speed. More complicated aerial manoeuvres may require an Athletics (S) Test, with +Double Rank bonus dice. In addition, you can spend Shifts on a successful ranged attack Test to inflict the Pinned Condition on the target.

name: Archon
description: You are the master of a warrior Kabal, seeking bounties in realspace that will expand your territory in Commorragh.

abilities.name: Overlord
abilities.description: You drive your underlings toward success by threatening them with the consequences of failure. As a Simple Action, you may spend 1 Wrath to provide yourself and all allies +Rank bonus dice to the next Test they make this encounter in your presence. In addition, you may spend 1 Glory to gain 1 Wrath Point as a Free Action, up to Rank times per session.

name: Haemonculus
description: You are a twisted genius committed to violating the laws of nature and transcending the limits of flesh.

abilities.name: Master of Pain
abilities.description: You have inflicted such violations upon your own flesh that enemy attacks are barely cause for concern. You gain +Rank Resilience. In addition, when you heal another creature's Wounds, you can choose to heal additional Wounds by inflicting an equal amount of Shock on the patient, up to Double Rank.

name: Succubus
description: You are the leader of a Wych Cult, a gladiatorial bloodletter celebrated for murderous skill and an undisputed master of personal combat.

abilities.name: Bride of Death
abilities.description: You shock your fellow warriors into greater acts of spectacular slaughter. Once per Turn as a Free Action, you may spend 1 Wrath to provide yourself and all allies in communication range +Rank ED on any melee attacks made until the start of your next Turn. When wearing no armour besides a Wychsuit, you gain +Rank Defence against ranged attacks.

name: Troupe Player
description: You are a warrior-artist, a performer in a Harlequin Troupe, mastering the dance of death in honour of the Laughing God.

abilities.name: War Dancer
abilities.description: You fight best as part of a chorus, the strikes of your allies blurring into your own as a storm of blades. You gain +Double Rank bonus dice on melee attacks against an enemy engaged with an ally.

wargearChoices: Harlequin's Blade or Harlequin's Caress or Harlequin's Embrace or Harlequin's Kiss

name: Death Jester
description: You are a ranged-support specialist with a dark sense of humour, embodying the role of Death by wearing the bones of your predecessor.

abilities.name: Death Is Not Enough
abilities.description: You delight in brutal volleys of firepower that demoralise and terrify your enemies. When you succeed on a ranged attack, any targets of the attack must make a Fear Test, with a DN of 1 + Double Rank. If none of your targets survived the attack, you can choose another character who witnessed the attack to make the Fear Test instead.

name: Shadowseer
description: You are a sanity-warping, illusion-conjuring performance-psyker, guiding your Troupe according to Fate's fickle whims.

abilities.name: Phantasmancer
abilities.description: You know the Universal Psyker Abilities and the Smite psychic power. You may choose two powers you know from any of the following Disciplines: Divination, Phantasmancy, Telepathy.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Pistol or Neuro Disruptor

name: Troupe Master
description: You are the director, general, high priest, and lead performer of your Troupe, an exemplar of Cegorach's teachings.

abilities.name: Choreographer of War
abilities.description: When you, or any allies within communication range, spend Glory to increase damage, they inflict +Rank damage (in addition to +1 damage per Glory spent). In addition, you may Seize the Initiative without spending Glory, up to Rank times per combat.

wargearChoices: Aeldari Power Sword or Harlequin's Caress or Harlequin's Embrace or Harlequin's Kiss; Fusion Pistol or Neuro Disruptor or Shuriken Pistol

name: Voidreaver
description: You are a recent recruit to the Corsair fleet, looking to make a name for yourself and enjoy the bounty from the raids you join.

abilities.name: Raiders of the Void
abilities.description: You are a raider, experienced at operating in the vacuum of space. You gain +Rank bonus dice to melee or ranged attacks when you Seize the Initiative. You gain a further +1 die bonus if this ability is used when fighting in zero gravity.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Rifle or Shuriken Pistol and Void Sabre

name: Soul Weaver & Way Seeker
description: You are a powerful Psyker, wielding devastating energies while guarding the souls of the fallen.

abilities.name: Void Dreamer
abilities.description: You have the PSYKER Keyword, and are a Psyker. You know the Universal Psyker Abilities and the Smite psychic power.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Pistol and Corsair Sabre or Witchstaff

name: Voidscarred
description: As one of the Voidscarred, you relish the thrill of the hunt and collect trinkets and trophies to sate your ego.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Stars
abilities.description: Your training has prepared you for any battlefield. When you make a Critical Hit you may roll twice on the Critical Hit table and choose either result.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Rifle or Shuriken Pistol and Void Sabre

name: Felarch
description: You are a veteran Corsair, inspiring those in your command and cutting through enemy resistance.

abilities.name: Captain of the Stars
abilities.description: You and any allies within 20 metres of you that can see you may add +Double Rank bonus dice to Resolve Tests. You add +Double Rank bonus dice to any Intimidation (Wil) Tests, including Interaction Attacks.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Rifle or Shuriken Pistol and Master-Crafted Void Sabre

name: Corsair Prince
description: You are the leader of a Corsair fleet, known equally as both a brilliant strategist and ruthless mercenary.

abilities.name: Lord of the Galaxy
abilities.description: You gain +Double Rank bonus dice to social Skill Tests when interacting with a character with the AELDARI or DRUKHARI Keywords. You gain +Double Rank bonus to all Cunning Tests when commanding ANHRATHE characters and units.

name: Air Caste Messenger (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A courier and communications specialist of the T'au Air Caste, carrying vital messages between T'au forces.

abilities.name: Swift Messenger
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice to Pilot tests and may reroll up to Rank dice on Initiative tests at the start of combat.

wargearChoices: Pulse Pistol, T'au Recon Armour, Vox Caster

name: Back-Alley Doc (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A skilled but unlicensed healer who plies their trade outside of official Imperial channels, treating those who cannot or will not seek sanctioned medical care.

abilities.name: Improvised Healing
abilities.description: You may make Medicae tests without the use of a medikit, relying on numerous improvised techniques. In addition, when you heal an ally's Wounds, they also recover 1d3+Rank Shock.

wargearChoices: Mono-Knife, stubber or laspistol, common clothing, medikit, 3 uses of Stimm

name: Beastman Auxiliary (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A twisted abhuman pressed into the service of the Emperor, fighting to atone for the sin of their existence.

abilities.name: Bestial Zealotry
abilities.description: When you can see an enemy (either an obvious foe, or a creature identified as an enemy by an ally or superior), you add +Rank to your Resolve, and add +Rank bonus dice to any melee attacks you make when you charge.

wargearChoices: Two melee weapons each of Value 3 or less of up to Common rarity, primitive armour

name: Chaos Cultist (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: You have sworn yourself to the Dark Gods, seeking to liberate yourself from the oppression of the Imperium or lured to darkness by promises of power.

abilities.name: The Enemy Within
abilities.description: While disguised, you gain +Rank bonus dice on all Deception tests to pass as an Imperial citizen. When no longer disguised, you gain +Rank bonus dice on all Interaction Attacks against targets with the IMPERIUM keyword.

wargearChoices: Autopistol or laspistol, knife, common clothing, Chaos Icon

name: Earth Caste Technician (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: An Earth Caste engineer and artisan, skilled in the creation and maintenance of T'au technology.

abilities.name: Earth Caste Expertise
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice on Tech tests to repair or construct T'au technology. You may make Tech tests to repair T'au equipment as a Simple Action rather than an Action.

wargearChoices: Pulse Pistol, T'au Recon Armour, Combi-Tool equivalent

name: Enforcer (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: An officer of the Adeptus Arbites, enforcing Imperial law with an iron fist.

abilities.name: Imperial Authority
abilities.description: You add +Rank bonus dice to Intimidation tests against targets with the IMPERIUM keyword. Once per scene, you may declare Imperial Law, forcing a target to make a DN 3 Resolve test or be compelled to cooperate.

wargearChoices: Arbites Combat Shotgun, Repression Baton, Arbites Carapace, Book of Judgement (Abridged), Magnacles

name: Frateris Militia (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A faithful citizen whipped into a fervour and eager to slay in the Emperor's name.

abilities.name: Righteous Fervour
abilities.description: When fighting enemies with the CHAOS, HERETIC, or any Xenos keyword, you gain +Rank bonus dice to Resolve tests and melee attack tests.

wargearChoices: Improvised weapon or club, common clothing, devotional icon

name: Fire Caste Breacher (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A T'au Fire Warrior specialising in close-quarters combat, clearing enemy fortifications with pulse blasters.

abilities.name: Breacher Assault
abilities.description: When making a ranged attack at Short Range, you gain +Rank bonus dice to the attack test.

wargearChoices: Pulse Blaster, T'au Combat Armour, Photon Grenade x2

name: Fire Caste Pathfinder (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A T'au scout and forward observer, providing markerlight support and reconnaissance for T'au forces.

abilities.name: Vanguard Recon
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice to Stealth and Awareness tests. When you successfully use a Markerlight on a target, allies gain an additional +1 bonus die on attacks against that target.

wargearChoices: Pulse Carbine, Markerlight, T'au Recon Armour, Photon Grenade x2

name: Fire Caste Warrior (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A line infantry soldier of the T'au Fire Caste, armed with the iconic Pulse Rifle.

abilities.name: Volley Fire
abilities.description: When making a ranged attack with a Pulse weapon at Medium or Long range, you may add +Rank to the weapon's ED.

wargearChoices: Pulse Rifle, T'au Combat Armour, Photon Grenade x2, EMP Grenade

name: Guardian (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A citizen-soldier of an Aeldari Craftworld, called to arms in times of need to defend their home.

abilities.name: Citizen Soldier
abilities.description: Outside of combat, you gain +Rank bonus dice to one non-combat skill of your choice (chosen at character creation). In combat, you gain +1 to your Defence.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Catapult, Mesh Armour

name: Hearthkyn Warrior (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A frontline soldier of the Leagues of Votann, armed and armoured with advanced Kin technology.

abilities.name: Ancestral Grudge
abilities.description: When you attack a target that has previously wounded you or an ally during this combat, you gain +Rank bonus dice to the attack test.

wargearChoices: Autoch-pattern Bolter, Void Armour, Plasma Knife

name: Imperial Guard Medic (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A disciplined soldier trained to treat the injuries of their comrades under fire.

abilities.name: Battlefield Medic
abilities.description: You may perform Medicae tests as a Simple Action rather than an Action in combat. When you successfully heal a Wound, the target also recovers 1d3 Shock.

wargearChoices: Lasgun, Flak Armour, Medikit, Knife

name: Imperial Guard Officer (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A stern commander trained to inspire and lead others into the fray.

abilities.name: Voice of Command
abilities.description: As a Simple Action, you may issue an order to an ally with the ASTRA MILITARUM keyword within 12m. That ally gains +Rank bonus dice on their next test.

wargearChoices: Laspistol, Chainsword, Flak Armour, Vox Bead

name: Kabalite Warrior (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A cruel warrior of a Drukhari Kabal, raiding realspace for slaves and suffering to sustain their withered souls.

abilities.name: Raider
abilities.description: When attacking a Surprised or Prone target, you gain +Rank ED on your attack.

wargearChoices: Splinter Rifle, Kabalite Armour, Poisoned Blades

name: Khorngor (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A beastman devoted to Khorne, the Blood God, fighting with savage fury and bloodlust.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.description: When you kill an enemy in melee combat, you immediately gain +Rank bonus dice on your next melee attack test.

wargearChoices: Great weapon (axe or sword), primitive armour

name: Pestigor (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A beastman devoted to Nurgle, the Plague God, spreading pestilence and decay.

abilities.name: Plague Carrier
abilities.description: You are immune to the Poisoned condition. Enemies that wound you in melee must pass a DN 3 Toughness test or gain the Poisoned condition.

wargearChoices: Plague Knife, primitive armour

name: Penal Legionnaire (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: Convicted of a crime and sent to a penal legion, you now have the honour of dying for the Emperor.

abilities.name: Expendable
abilities.description: You gain +Rank to your Determination. However, you may not refuse orders from characters with the ASTRA MILITARUM keyword of higher rank.

wargearChoices: Lasgun, Knife, Explosive Collar, Flak Armour (worn)

name: Sister Dialogus Polyglot (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A devout scholar of language, ensuring that the Emperor's Word is understood by all peoples across the Imperium.

abilities.name: Linguistic Mastery
abilities.description: You know additional languages equal to twice your Scholar rank. You gain +Rank bonus dice on all Scholar tests related to translation or linguistics. Once per scene, you may automatically comprehend the gist of a spoken or written passage in an unfamiliar language.

wargearChoices: Sororitas Power Armour, Laspistol, Sororitas Vestments, Rule of the Sororitas

name: Sister Famulous (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A pious advisor to those of noble birth and ancient bloodlines, skilled in diplomacy and genealogy.

abilities.name: Political Advisor
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice on all Persuasion and Insight tests when dealing with characters with the IMPERIUM keyword. You may spend a point of Glory to gain a piece of useful information about the political or social situation in the current setting.

wargearChoices: Sororitas Power Armour, Laspistol, Sororitas Vestments, Rule of the Sororitas

name: Sister Novitiate (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A young, devout Sister, still learning the ways of her Order but eager to prove her faith through service.

abilities.name: Zealous Devotion
abilities.description: You gain +Rank to your Resolve and Conviction. When you fail a Resolve test, you may spend 1 Glory to reroll.

wargearChoices: Sororitas Power Armour, Bolt Pistol, Power Sword or Chainsword

name: Slaangor (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A beastman devoted to Slaanesh, the Prince of Pleasure, revelling in excess and sensation.

abilities.name: Excess of Sensation
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice on Initiative tests. When you inflict a Wound on an enemy, you may heal 1 Shock.

wargearChoices: Two paired weapons, primitive armour

name: Tzaangor (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A beastman devoted to Tzeentch, the Changer of Ways, touched by mutation and sorcerous power.

abilities.name: Touched by Change
abilities.description: Once per session, you may reroll all dice on a single test. You must accept the second result, even if it is worse.

wargearChoices: Paired weapons, primitive armour, Chaos Icon

name: Void Reaver (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: An Aeldari Corsair, a pirate and raider who plies the void between the stars.

abilities.name: Void Raider
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice on Pilot tests and all tests made in zero-gravity environments. You may reroll up to Rank dice on Initiative tests.

wargearChoices: Shuriken Pistol, Lasblaster, Mesh Armour

name: Water Caste Functionary (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A T'au diplomat and administrator, skilled in negotiation, bureaucracy, and xeno-linguistics.

abilities.name: Diplomatic Envoy
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice on all Persuasion tests. Once per scene, you may make a DN 3 Persuasion test to convince a non-hostile target to hear you out, even if they are normally hostile to your faction.

wargearChoices: Pulse Pistol, T'au Flight Suit, Polyglot Hedron

name: Wrack (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A grotesque servant of a Haemonculus Coven, surgically altered to serve as loyal bodyguards and enforcers.

abilities.name: Torturer's Craft
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice on Medicae tests and Intimidation tests. You are immune to the Fear condition when caused by grotesque or disturbing sights.

wargearChoices: Wrack Blades, Haemacolyte's Tools

name: Wych (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A gladiatorial warrior of the Drukhari Wych Cults, fighting in the arenas of Commorragh for the thrill of combat.

abilities.name: Combat Drugs
abilities.description: At the start of each combat, roll 1d6 to determine your combat drug effect: 1-2: +1 Strength, 3-4: +1 Agility, 5-6: +1 Toughness. The effect lasts for the duration of the combat.

wargearChoices: Hekatarii Blade, Wychsuit, Splinter Pistol

name: Wyrd (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: An unsanctioned psyker, hiding their powers from the authorities while scraping by in the underhive.

abilities.name: Wild Talent
abilities.description: You know the Smite power and 2 Minor psychic powers. However, whenever you use a psychic power, if you roll a 1 on the Wrath die, the GM gains 1 additional Ruin.

wargearChoices: Knife, common clothing, hooded cloak

name: Aeronautica Pilot (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A skilled pilot of the Imperial Navy's Aeronautica Imperialis, flying dangerous missions in the Emperor's name.

abilities.name: Ace Pilot
abilities.description: You gain +Rank bonus dice to all Pilot tests. When piloting a vehicle, you may add +Rank to the vehicle's Defence.

wargearChoices: Laspistol, Aeronautica Flight Suit, Vox Bead

name: Astropath (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: Soul-bound to the Emperor, blinded by His light, and able to communicate between worlds through psychic communion.

abilities.name: Soul Binding
abilities.description: You are blind but perceive the world through psychic senses. You are immune to effects that require sight (such as gaze attacks) but suffer +2DN on all tests that normally rely on vision. You gain +Rank bonus dice on Psychic Mastery tests to communicate telepathically.

wargearChoices: Laspistol, Psykana Mercy Blade, Robes, Psy Focus

name: Beast Snagga Boy (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: An Ork who prefers to hunt the biggest, meanest beasts in the galaxy, revelling in the primal thrill of the chase.

abilities.name: Monster Hunterz
abilities.description: When attacking a target whose Size is larger than yours, you gain +Rank ED on your attack.

wargearChoices: Choppa, Slugga, Beast Hide Armour, Stikk Bomb x2

name: Navigator (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A member of the Navis Nobilite, blessed with the Warp Eye, you guide ships through the Immaterium.

abilities.name: The Lidless Stare
abilities.description: As an Action, you may open your Warp Eye and target a creature within 12m. The target must make a DN 4 + your Rank Willpower test or suffer 1d3 Mortal Wounds. DAEMON and PSYKER targets suffer +1 Mortal Wound.

wargearChoices: Laspistol or Navis Hatchet, Armoured Voidsuit, Auspex

name: Crisis Suit Pilot (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A veteran T'au Fire Warrior who has earned the honour of piloting an XV8 Crisis Battlesuit into combat.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Ace
abilities.description: While piloting a Battlesuit, you gain +Rank bonus dice to Ballistic Skill tests and may use the Battlesuit's jet systems to Fly as part of your movement.

wargearChoices: XV8 Crisis Battlesuit (with 3 weapons/support systems), Pulse Pistol

name: Assault Space Marine (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A deadly shock trooper of the Adeptus Astartes, taking the fight to the enemy with chainsword and bolt pistol.

abilities.name: Assault Doctrine
abilities.description: When you charge, you gain +Rank ED on your melee attacks for that turn. You may use a jump pack to fly your Speed as part of a charge.

wargearChoices: Bolt Pistol, Chainsword, Frag Grenades, Krak Grenades, Aquila Mk VII Power Armour, Jump Pack

name: Devastator Space Marine (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A ruthless heavy weapons specialist of the Adeptus Astartes, delivering death at a distance.

abilities.name: Devastation Doctrine
abilities.description: When making a ranged attack with a Heavy weapon while stationary (did not move this turn), you gain +Rank ED on the attack.

wargearChoices: Heavy Bolter or Lascannon or Missile Launcher, Bolt Pistol, Frag Grenades, Krak Grenades, Aquila Mk VII Power Armour

name: Grey Knight Space Marine (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A member of the secretive Grey Knights Chapter, an elite psychic daemon-hunter sworn to protect humanity from the horrors of the Warp.

abilities.name: Daemon Hunter
abilities.description: You gain +Rank ED on all attacks against targets with the DAEMON keyword. You are immune to the Fear and Terror conditions when caused by DAEMON creatures. You know the Smite power and 2 Sanctic Discipline powers.

wargearChoices: Nemesis Force Sword or Nemesis Force Halberd, Storm Bolter, Aegis Armour, Psyk-Out Grenades, Liber Daemonica

name: Chaos Sorcerer (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A wielder of dark sorcerous powers, drawing upon the Warp to unleash devastating psychic attacks.

abilities.name: Dark Sorcery
abilities.description: You know Smite and 3 powers from the Dark Hereticus or your god's discipline. When you manifest a psychic power, you may add +Rank bonus dice to the Psychic Mastery test by suffering 1 Corruption.

wargearChoices: Force Stave or Force Sword, Bolt Pistol, Power Armour, Chaos Icon

name: Harlequin Player (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A performer and warrior of the Laughing God, dancing through battle with lethal grace.

abilities.name: Rising Crescendo
abilities.description: After making a melee attack, you may immediately move up to half your Speed without provoking free attacks. You gain +Rank to your Defence while in melee combat.

wargearChoices: Harlequin's Blade or Harlequin's Kiss, Shuriken Pistol, Holo-Suit, Flip-Belt

name: Custodian Guard (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: A warrior of the Adeptus Custodes, the Emperor's personal bodyguard, individually crafted to be the finest warriors in the Imperium.

abilities.name: The Emperor's Finest
abilities.description: You gain +Rank to your Defence and Resilience. You may reroll up to Rank dice on any test once per round. You are immune to Fear and Terror.

wargearChoices: Guardian Spear, Sentinel Blade, Auramite Custodes Power Armour, Misericordia

name: Arbites Subductor (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: While wielding a shield, you may take the Full Defence action as a Simple Action, rather than a Full-Round Action, and you may add +1 die to the Initiative Test for each ally wielding a Shield within ...

abilities.name: Inviolate Jurisdiction
abilities.description: While wielding a shield, you may take the Full Defence action as a Simple Action, rather than a Full-Round Action, and you may add +1 die to the Initiative Test for each ally wielding a Shield within Rank metres.

name: Arbites Vigilant (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: When you make a ranged attack at short range with a Shotgun of any kind, for each Exalted Icon you shift for additional damage, you add +2ED rather than +1ED.

abilities.name: Ruthless Efficiency
abilities.description: When you make a ranged attack at short range with a Shotgun of any kind, for each Exalted Icon you shift for additional damage, you add +2ED rather than +1ED.

name: Banisher (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: You have +1 Faith Point. When you attempt an Intimidation or Persuasion Interaction Attack against a DAEMON, you may spend one Faith point to invoke the Litany of Purity. If the Interaction Attack suc...

abilities.name: Litany of Purity
abilities.description: You have +1 Faith Point. When you attempt an Intimidation or Persuasion Interaction Attack against a DAEMON, you may spend one Faith point to invoke the Litany of Purity. If the Interaction Attack succeeds, the DAEMON is Pinned in addition to other effects, and suffers 1d3 Mortal Wounds, +1 per Exalted Icon shifted.

startingWargear: one melee weapon of up to Value 7 and a rarity of up to Rare

name: Black Sentinel (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: You are trained to react swiftly to psychic phenomena. When a PSYKER within Double Rank metres of you attempts to use a Psychic Power, or suffers Perils of the Warp, you may use your Reflexive action ...

abilities.name: Witch-Guard
abilities.description: You are trained to react swiftly to psychic phenomena. When a PSYKER within Double Rank metres of you attempts to use a Psychic Power, or suffers Perils of the Warp, you may use your Reflexive action to immediately attack that Psyker. If the attack inflicts one or more Wounds, the psychic power and any accompanying Perils of the Warp immediately fails. If you use this ability on a friendly Psyker, you may choose to reduce the damage inflicted by up to Rank.

name: Bonesinger (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: You are a psyker; you know the Smite and Vaulâ€™s Song psychic powers and may purchase other powers from the Divination discipline, the Runes of Shaping discipline, and one other discipline of your choi...

abilities.name: Path of the Shaper
abilities.description: You are a psyker; you know the Smite and Vaulâ€™s Song psychic powers and may purchase other powers from the Divination discipline, the Runes of Shaping discipline, and one other discipline of your choice.

name: Burna Boy (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: You add +1 to Resolve for every creature you can see which is currently On Fire. Each time you set a new creature On Fire, recover Rank +1 Shock.

abilities.name: Da Burny Dance
abilities.description: You add +1 to Resolve for every creature you can see which is currently On Fire. Each time you set a new creature On Fire, recover Rank +1 Shock.

name: Calculus Logi (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: Whenever you succeed at an Investigation or Scholar test, and shift an Exalted Icon to gain additional information, you may ask a number of additional questions equal to your Rank. In addition, at the...

abilities.name: Infovore
abilities.description: Whenever you succeed at an Investigation or Scholar test, and shift an Exalted Icon to gain additional information, you may ask a number of additional questions equal to your Rank. In addition, at the start of a scene, you may spend 1 Glory to ask the GM to give you a number of facts about the location or situation equal to your Rank.

name: Chirurgeon (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: When you attempt an Intimidation or Investigation Test to uncover information, you may add bonus dice equal to your Medicae skill ranks.

abilities.name: Morbid Expertise
abilities.description: When you attempt an Intimidation or Investigation Test to uncover information, you may add bonus dice equal to your Medicae skill ranks.

name: Corpuscarius Electro-Priest (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: Your maximum Shock is increased by +Double Rank, and you ignore all penalties for being Wounded.

abilities.name: Voltaic Fanaticism
abilities.description: Your maximum Shock is increased by +Double Rank, and you ignore all penalties for being Wounded.

name: Demagogue (Abundance of Apocrypha)

abilities.name: Serpentâ€™s Tongue You add +Rank bonus dice to all Persuasion and Intimidation Interaction attacks against targets with the IMPERIUM, SCUM, or HERETIC keywords. On a successful Interaction Attack, you may spend 1 Wrath to add +Rank Exalted Icons to the result.

startingWargear: one melee weapon or one ranged weapon of up to Value 5 and a rarity of up to Rare

name: Fulgurite Electro-Priest (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: Your maximum Shock is increased by +Double Rank, and you ignore all penalties for being Wounded.

abilities.name: Voltaic Fanaticism
abilities.description: Your maximum Shock is increased by +Double Rank, and you ignore all penalties for being Wounded.

name: Hernkyn Pioneer (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: At the start of the first round of combat, before any turns have been taken, you may make a normal move (if on foot) or a normal Drive action (if on a Magna-Coil Bike).

abilities.name: Pioneer
abilities.description: At the start of the first round of combat, before any turns have been taken, you may make a normal move (if on foot) or a normal Drive action (if on a Magna-Coil Bike).

name: Historitor-Investigatus (Abundance of Apocrypha)
description: Your studies are broad and deep, and your wealth of knowledge can serve you in all manner of ways. When you make a skill test, you may spend 1 Wrath to use your Scholar (Int) dice pool instead of the ...

abilities.name: Intensive Research
abilities.description: Your studies are broad and deep, and your wealth of knowledge can serve you in all manner of ways. When you make a skill test, you may spend 1 Wrath to use your Scholar (Int) dice pool instead of the dice pool you would normally have used for that skill test.

startingWargear: one melee weapon and one ranged weapon
